name: Boom Boom Boom: A Sex Anthology
description: Boom Boom Boom is an anthology of woodcut and linocut wordless stories about sex. Produced in a limited edition of 200. Contributors: Stefan Berg, Dmitry Bondarenko, Marta Chudolinska, Colin Rogers, Megan Speers, Rihkee Strap, George Walker. Book, cover, endpaper design and binding: Marta Chudolinska The book was printed on the risograph by Jesjit Gill at Colour Code Printing in Toronto. Approximate dimensions: 5 3/4" x 5 1/8" x 3/8" Page count: 52 Binding style: Stab binding Questions? Contact martachudolinska at gmail dot com Need international shipping? Contact martachudolinska at gmail dot com for quote Note: Each book in the edition has been assembled and bound by hand and will therefore exhibit slight variations. This is one of the beautiful things about handmade work!
